titles.title: For the relief of Simeon Simeonov, Stela Simeonova, Stoyan Simeonov, and Vania Simeonova.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 12/9/2008--Introduced. Provides for the relief of Simeon Simeonov, Stela Simeonova, Stoyan Simeonov, and Vania Simeonova.
